title: Summer Monteys Fullam looks jovial as ever as she steps out in bright red ankle boots
text:
Summer Monteys Fullam looked full of beans on Thursday as she was snapped stepping out in London.

The red-head looked typically cheerful as she stopped at a petrol station with a pal, showcasing her radiant style.

The 24-year-old - who used to date Bake Off judge Paul Hollywood - strutted across the forecourt in a crisp white polo neck top, tucked into ripped skinny jeans.

Radiant: Summer Monteys Fullam looked full of beans on Thursday as she was snapped stepping out in London

She turned heads in a pair of bright red velvet ankle boots, accessorising with a cream Gucci belt.

Summer added large gold hooped earrings to the look as she whipped her auburn mane up atop her head, grinning from under her chunky fringe.

The beauty looked flawless as ever with a touch of bronzer on her cheeks and a sweep of mascara to her lashes, a nude slick to her lips.

She whipped off her black winter coat as she headed back to her car with a pink-haired pal.

Stunner: The red-head looked typically cheerful as she stopped at a petrol station with a pal, showcasing her radiant style

Fashionista: The 24-year-old strutted across the forecourt in a crisp white polo neck top, tucked into ripped skinny jeans

Chic: She turned heads in a pair of bright red velvet ankle boots, accessorising with a cream Gucci belt

Summer has been throwing herself into work while balancing a busy life on London's social scene over the last couple of weeks.

She has recently hired an agent after media interest has whipped up around her, and has teased that she will be auditioning for acting roles in the coming weeks.

She took a brief late-summer trip abroad with her sister where she was seen scrutinizing a script, while sunbathing, and teasing that exciting things are on the cards for her.

Icon: Summer added large gold hooped earrings to the look as she whipped her auburn mane up atop her head, grinning from under her chunky fringe

Beauty: She looked flawless as ever with a touch of bronzer on her cheeks and a sweep of mascara to her lashes, a nude slick to her lips

Cool down: She whipped off her black winter coat as she headed back to her car with a pink-haired pal

Although rumours are rife she will appear on the forthcoming season of I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here! she appeared to brush off the suggestion when she appeared on the radio last week.

Asked whether she would sign on to reality TV, she said - after a very long pause: 'No. I am focusing on the options in front of me.'

She specifically mentioned Love Island, claiming: 'No, it’s just not for me. I'd miss my animals too much.'

Summer insisted on Thursday night that she has merely found herself in a situation where 'doors are opening' for her and is 'looking at her options'.

Werking it: Summer dated Paul Hollywood until a couple of months ago

Chit chat: She gossiped with her pal as they headed back to the car

Matching: She and her friend both went for the white turtle neck look

She said: 'It’s been an adventure and I have taken it in my stride. I am just true to me and myself. I have amazing family and friends. But it's scary and daunting.'

She went on: 'I didn’t ask for this, I didn’t ask for these doors to be opened. I was sucked into it – in a good way. I need to see what my options are.'

She teased that TV presenting and acting are on the cards: 'I’m excited to see where it would take me. I want to get my ducks in a row. I’d love to do something with my animals. They are my passion.'

A laugh a minute: Summer and her friend were engrossed in their conversation

Happy times: Summer slipped on a padded jacket as she arrived at her Manchester hotel

Strut: The beauty looked sensational as she headed out for the afternoon

Chat: Summer appeared deep in conversation with her pink-haired pal
